text: Antonio Ambrosetti (November 25, 1944 â€“ November 20, 2020) was an Italian mathematician. He worked in the fields of partial differential equations and calculus of variations. Ambrosetti died on November 20, 2020 in Venice at the age of 75.Morto il matematico Antonio Ambrosetti, professore ordinario della Normale di Pisa ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian mathematicians
